alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 12:00AM EDT until August 25 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FOR EASTERN ERIE AND EASTERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 1200 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles north of Falconer to near Wattsburg to near Albion, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Corry, Titusville, North East, Union City, Waterford, Wattsburg, Riceville, Lincolnville, Canadohta Lake, Guys Mills, Harborcreek, Hydetown, Mill Village, Townville, Spartansburg and Elgin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
